page.title: 20Gods and Ghosts-Dorking NE
page.content: We asked some of the people we talked to if they had any religious beliefs or{supernatural}experiences. Whilst some believed,some had no beliefs one was a dedicated{Christian, church warden and a member of the {Synod,}another was a Methodist and another a converted Catholic. There were people who told us they had seen ghosts or heard voices and had{psychic experiences.}One man had seen the outline of a head on the back seat of his car.Noises of a punch-bag had been heard at a pub which used to have a boxing ring in it.A steady grave-digger had heard mumbled voices in a tomb.A middle-aged secretary had a vision of her deceased father in law warning her to expect disaster when she got home.Disaster had struck! She had been burgled and her daughter had knife injuries.
